title: Young artists find platform to show off their artworks (Shanghai Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Shanghai Municipal Government ) Ren Haihua, 21, considers himself lucky to be able to exhibit his pictures in front of Shanghai Theater Academy . And he has Rising Artist's Works ( R.A.W !) Land week to thank for it. As part of the
